Class PlexusLifecycleListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts2.plexus.PlexusLifecycleListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    public class PlexusLifecycleListener
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener
    Manages the Plexus lifecycle for the servlet and session contexts
